title: Superfield Formalism of Stochastic Quantization Method with Field-Dependent Kernels
abstract: I consider a Langevin equation with field-dependent kernels and investigate supersymmetry of the stochastic generating functional constructed from the Langevin equation. Moreover I describe the stochastic generating functional in terms of a superfield. In the superfield formalism, it becomes clear that the stochastic quantization method with the field-dependent kernel is equivalent to the path-integral quantization method.
